alert.note: Alert for Benton; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lafayette, north central Chickasaw, Pontotoc, Union, Marshall, southwestern Tippah and southern Benton Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harmontown to Etta to Troy. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, New Albany, Holly Springs, Pontotoc, Ripley, Trace State Park, Wall Doxey State Park, Blue Mountain, Ecru, Cambridge, Harmontown, Keownville, New Harmony, Bethlehem, Troy, Red Banks, Laws Hill, Etta, Gravestown and Furrs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Tippah; Union
